Name: arrow
2nd person description: You draw the string of your bow far back and let it go. With your eyes you follow the trajectory of the [adjective] arrow you just shot as it flies towards the [monster]
3rd person description: The [monster] draws the string of [his] bow far back and lets it go. With [his] eyes [he] follow the trajectory of the [adjective] arrow [he] just shot.

Name: attack
2nd person description: You charge at the [monster] and attack [him] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The [monster] charges at you and attacks you [adverbial].

Name: bat
2nd person description: You take aim and then swing your bat of [material] at the [monster].
3rd person description: The [monster] takes aim and swings [his] bat of [material] at you.

Name: branch
2nd person description: You pick up a nearby tree branch and imbue it with the powers of [material], before throwing it at the [monster].
3rd person description: The [monster] picks up a nearby tree branch, imbues it with the powers of [material], and then throws it at you.

Name: catapult
2nd person description: It takes a lot of time to load the catapult of [material] up with a heavy rock. Nevertheless, it is very staisfying to see the [adjective] projectile fly towards the [monster].
3rd person description: The [monster] rolls up a catapult of [material], then slowly loads it up with a [adjective] rock. [he] then pulls the lever, and you see the projectile flying towards you.

Name: curse
2nd person description: You wiggle your hands around in the air, and bestow a curse of [material] upon the [monster].
3rd person description: Wiggling [his] hands around for a while, the [monster] bestows upon you the curse of [material].

Name: eye
2nd person description: You look at the [monster] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The monster looks at you [adverbial].

Name: hit
2nd person description: You charge at the [monster] and hit [him] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The [monster] charges at you and hits [adverbial].

Name: honk
2nd person description: You honk at the [monster] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The [monster] honks at you [adverbial].

Name: howl
2nd person description: You howl at the [monster] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The [monster] howls at you [adverbial].

Name: kick
2nd person description: You kick the [monster] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The [monster] kicks you [adverbial].

Name: orb
2nd person description: You summon an orb of [material] in your hands and throw it at the [monster].
3rd person description: The [monster] summons an orb of [material] in [his] hands and throws it at you.

Name: herb
2nd person description: Somewhere in your pouch you find a mysterious herb. You eat it. It tastes horrible, and causes you to spit [material] at the [monster].
3rd person description: Out of nowhere the [monster] takes a mysterious herb. [he] puts it in [his] mouth, which causes [him] to spit [material] at you.

Name: poke
2nd person description: You point with your left index at the [monster], walk towards [him] and slightly poke [him] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The [monster] points with [his] left index at you, walks towards you and slightly pokes you [adverbial].

Name: shot
2nd person description: You make a finger gun and shoot the [monster] with [material].
3rd person description: The [monster] makes a finger gun and shoots you with [material].

Name: slash
2nd person description: Taking out your blade, you swiftly slash the [monster] [adverbial]
3rd person description: The [monster] takes out [his] blade and swiftly slashes you [adverbial].

Name: smash
2nd person description: You lift your fists, jump up and pound everything below you with [a] [adjective] smash.
3rd person description: The [monster] lifts his fists, jumps into the air and pounds the ground with [a] [adjective] smash.

Name: smite
2nd person description: You smite the [monster] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The [monster] smites you [adverbial].

Name: scream
2nd person description: After taking a deep breath, you open your mouth and scream at the [monster] [adverbial].
3rd person description: The ]monster] takes a deep breath and screms at you [adverbial].

Name: spell
2nd person description: Focusing your magic powers in your hands, you call upon the powers of [material] and cast a [adjective] spell onto the [monster].
3rd person description: The [monster] focuses all [his] magic power into [his] hands, calls upon the powers of [material] and casts [a] adjective spell onto you.

Name: storm
2nd person description: You summon a [adjective] storm. Windy clouds of [material] surround the [monster].
3rd person description: The [monster] summons a [adjective] storm. Windy clouds of [material] surround you.

Name: sword
2nd person description: You quickly draw your [adjective] sword, aim it at the [monster] and slash [him] with it.
3rd person description: The [monster] quickly draws [his] [adjective] sword and swings it at you.

Name: tree
2nd person description: Praying to the Goddess of Nature makes [a] [adjective] tree grow next to the [monster]. Its leaves are made of [material].
3rd person description: Praying to the Goddess of Nature makes [a] [adjective] tree grow next you. Its leaves are made of [material].

Name: wall
2nd person description: Walls of [material] surround the [monster].
3rd person description: You are surrounded by walls of [material]

Name: whip
2nd person description: You grab the whip hanging on your belt, and swing it towards the [monster]. [a] [adjective] bang can be heard everywhere.
3rd person description: The [monster] grabs a whip hanging from [his] belt and swings it at you. [a] [adjective] bang can be heard everywhere.

Name: whisper
2nd person description: A silent call of [material] reaches the ears of the [monster]
3rd person description: A silent call of [material] reaches your ears.

Name: light
2nd person description: You cast [a] [adjective] light, which blinds the [monster] for a few seconds.
3rd person description: [a] [adjective] light has been casted on you and causes a blinds you for a few seconds.
